about_the_game:
Riftbreaker's Captain Ashley S. Nowak explores and tames strange new worlds, what stops her from breaking the rift into Hellcard? Nothing as it turns out.

This exclusive and time-limited DLC contains an Ashley Nowak outfit for the Rogue class. Mr. Riggs didn't fit into the paper dungeons but she got a nice mecha bow instead!
detailed_description:
Riftbreaker's Captain Ashley S. Nowak explores and tames strange new worlds, what stops her from breaking the rift into Hellcard? Nothing as it turns out.

This exclusive and time-limited DLC contains an Ashley Nowak outfit for the Rogue class. Mr. Riggs didn't fit into the paper dungeons but she got a nice mecha bow instead!
name: HELLCARD - Riftbreaker's Ashley Outfit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core or Greater
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible

short_description: Riftbreaker's Captain Ashley S. Nowak explores and tames strange new worlds, what stops her from breaking the rift into Hellcard? Nothing as it turns out. This exclusive and time-limited DLC contains an Ashley Nowak outfit for the Rogue class.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
